data.description: Position the nodes and edges of a graph
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I chose Graph::Drawing::* because 1. the name of the mathematical
    discipline is "graph drawing", and 2. There is a top level namespace
    called "Graph" already.

    Graph::Layout might be a more meaningful name, but due to
    historical reasons, that would be misleading and possibly annoying
    to the purists out there.
